title: What exactly does the selectnbrecv function from Golang do?
content: I'm reverse engineering a Golang binary and came across the function selectnbrecv. However, I don't understand the documentation. I'll appreciate it if someone can explain to me the context and operation of the function. Thanks!

comments.text: This might be better suited for StackOverflow.
@IgorSkochinsky Will ask there. Thank you!
